Description.Text:
Position Only a few steps from the beach and near the new Fair Trade Centre of Rimini, Hotel Gaston is ideal for who travels for work or pleasure.
Restaurant Air condioned restaurant.
More Informations Last refurbishment in 2004.
Sweet and salty buffet breakfast. At lunch and dinner choice between 3 menus, mixed buffet, fruit or dessert.
The prices in HBB and FBB includes unlimited drinks, which are water, wine and soft drinks + 1 entrance of 30 min per room for the whirlpool + drinks (water and soft dinrks) of the minibar included (ONLY FOR THE FIRST DAY free).
The prices in all treatments include daily free entrance into the wellness centre, which is equipped with: turkish bath, sauna, emotional shower with cromo and aroma therapy, whirlpool with salty water, relax zone. The entrance is to be fixed on spot. Children under 16 years are not allowed to get into to the wellness centre.
Swimming pool open from 08/06/13 to 08/09/13 from 9.30am to 12.30(midday) and from 3.00pm to 7.00pm.
Check IN from 2.00pm. Check OUT until 10.00am.
